manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZANheadgear Neoprene Half Face Mask The ZANheadgear Neoprene Half Face Mask features full coverage of nose, chin, and cheeks with stretchy neoprene material that's water resistant and provides warmth. Nylon bound edges offer added comfort and durability. The hook and loop closure ensures great fit.

Neoprene Half Face Mask 3 Panel Half Mask Neoprene Full Face Mask Adjustable Face Mask with 2.5 Filter Features 2mm thick elastic nylon-lined neoprene provides thermal insulation & protection against water & abrasion. 3 panel conforms to face for a tailored fit, coverage of the face & neck. Nylon bound edges allow for durability and comfort Internal pocket for filters Material Neoprene Nylon Neoprene Cotton Wash Instructions Hand wash cold water. Lay flat to dry. Do not bleach or iron. Hand wash cold water. Lay flat to dry. Do not bleach or iron. Hand wash cold water. Lay flat to dry. Do not bleach or iron. Hand wash cold water. Lay flat to dry. Do not bleach or iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for protecting your face during Cold weather
reviews.reviewText: There are many pro's and con's with this product.Overall: The product is very good for it's money. It's very cheap, it WILL protect you from the cold, the coldest I have tried it was around 20F, not sure about colder weather or in Celsius. I do wear glasses, and sometimes, the mask does feel uncomfortable. However, I rather feel little bit uncomfortable than being very cold.Here are my pro's and con's.Pro's:- CHEAP and DURABLE- VALUE FOR YOUR BUCK - KEEPS YOUR FACE WARM DURING THE WINDY/COLD weather- IT CAN BE ADJUSTED TO YOUR FACE LENGTH ON THE BACK- THE DESIGN FITS MY FACE VERY GOOD, but can be some discomfort at some times.CONS- Only the discomfort at some times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for cold winds!
reviews.reviewText: I got this item for my daily commute, we had a sudden drop in temperature the day I got it but it worked perfectly! the holes are small enough not to freeze your face but you can still breathe perfectly! My only issue is that it's a little awkward to wear with a smaller head, you still can but it's a little off. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works really well, but it's a little small. Otherwise it's great. Used it in the real cold, teens, glasses don't fog up which is the main reason I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works pretty well.
reviews.reviewText: I modified mine, the nosehole was not wide enough and i cut it further, and it works fine. I wear glasses and some of the exhaled hot air from my nose goes up and fogs my glasses and this is sort of an issue that I wish didn't exist.I wear a lot of gear on my face and the area that runs across the top is trimmed, and it contacts the upper bridge of my nose and does apply a little bit of pressure (the pressure is aided by my large protective/proscription eye wear and other gear) and it gets a bit uncomfortable/painful for a full days work.Thankfully the mask itself does very well with the moisture that i breath out. The mask does not get cold on my skin in sub zero degrees Fahrenheit, though note that if you wear this over a balaclava or any type of cloth, even if that cloth is down at your chin and not in proximity of your nose or mouth, the cloth will collect moisture, resulting in a cold face upon removing the mask.Wearing this item under everything, or over everything, both have advantages and disadvantages, but overall I will continue to use this product unless I stumble across something that can do what it does and better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a big head and neck. I bought this product because of the way it was presented in the advertisement. It's not even worth the hassle of returning and getting less than full price back. The fact that the company has a return policy that let's you know, you will only get back half of what you paid, should've been a clue that they deal with a lot of returns. This should've also been apparent after I out myself in this situation of looking at reviews after. Note to self, look at the negative reviews too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit, pretty comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Using this for airsoft based off of dutch the hooligans loadout, nose slot needs to be cut a bit better to help with breathing and probably need to cut some bigger holes in the mouth before i sew in the mesh but once you get used to putting it on every time in the same spot its fine, havent been shot in the face with it on yet but it seems thick enough to give good protection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mask! Excellent deal!
reviews.reviewText: Quality mask! Great deal! Stylish. Excellent for cold weather! Arrived very quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too Small for an Average Size Adult Head
reviews.reviewText: This product wraps around your head from the base of your skull, at your hairline at the back of your head, across your nose. The circumference of this mask, with the Velcro completely overlapping, is only 17.5 inches. The Velcro extends 2.5 inches. The circumference of my head from my nose to the back of neck at the hairline is 20 inches. I wear a hat size of 7.5 for my head. I can wear this thing, but only using 1/2 inch of the Velcro, and it is eating into my face. I would only purchase this mask for young children or adults with small head sizes. Better yet, purchase a face mask that includes Turtle Fur and some elasticity. They will be much more comfortable.
Fits fantastic, is exactly as expected. Would recommend. 10/10

Tengo problemas de sinusitis por lo que compré esta máscara para poder correr en las mañanas con frío sin tener que estar teniendo problemas con el aire frío, me ha funcionado a la perfección, el material es bueno y creo que es un precio justo. He leído en otros comentarios que si eres muy cabezón no te queda, en mi caso me considero de cabeza normal y me queda de maravilla; próximamente pienso comprar otra para la época de frío y poderla usar en mis traslados mañaneros.
Stinkt furchtbar nach Gummi und Weichmacher. Trotz Handwäsche ist der Gestank noch vorhanden. Warte jetzt mal ab. Rezession Update folgt.Ware ging retoure.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, a little small while dressed for nasty weather
reviews.reviewText: I bought the largest size as I ski daily in the winter. It works GREAT! Keeps your face and cheeks warm when it’s really cold out (-25c) and your goggles do NOT fog when wearing it.The only reason I didn’t give it 5 starts is it’s a little too small when you’re also wearing a balaclava and neck tube. I had to extend it with a couple of pieces of Velcro.

La calidad del material es excelente, tiene un grosor considerable para cubrir del frio, pero a mi no me quedo porque esta quico, pero eso no le reduce la calidad, si buscas una mascara que solo cubra la boca y nariz esta esta es tu mejor opción pero cuidado si tienes una cabeza grande no te quedara.
